## ActionCodeSettings.iOS property

Sets the iOS bundle ID.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
iOS?: {
        bundleId: string;
    };
```

## Remarks

This will try to open the link in an iOS app if it is installed.

App installation is not supported for iOS.
